title: What happened to the recently played with tab on the client
body: I cant find it on the new Client. Is it still there somewhere or did they remove it

replies.body:
It's hidden within the "add friend" button.
It's kinda disorganized right now; they're working on it.

Recently played champions will be visible through Profile -> Match history -> on the right side.  If you have any feedback, feel free to share it on the [client discussion ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards for consideration.  Hope that helps!
